title: The inner screen model of consciousness: Applying the free energy principle directly to the study of conscious experience
authors_text: MJD Ramstead, M Albarracin, A Kiefer, B Klein… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2023 - arxiv.org
abstract:
This paper presents a model of consciousness that follows directly from the free-energy 
principle (FEP). We first rehearse the classical and quantum formulations of the FEP. In particular…
